name: Into the Drift
description:
Step into an infinite world of chaos in this top-down shooter that blends the roguelike elements of Vampire Survivor and Nuclear Throne with the exploration and survival mechanics of RymdResa and Delta-V: Rings of Saturn. As a daring space explorer, you aim to hunt down and eliminate terrifying extra-dimensional horrors that roam the Drift.

Navigate through procedurally generated environments to scavenge resources, upgrade your ship, and fight for survival against an endless array of deadly foes.

This game will keep you on the edge of your seat with intense battles, explosive weapons, and adrenaline-pumping action. Are you ready to brave the unknown and emerge victorious?

Good hunting, Diver.
